name: ksh-rube-goldberg
description: This is my recreation of a basic Rube Goldberg machine. I experimented with a few basic parameters with multiple moving parts. The goal I set was to have all the interactions end a the same bucket within a few seconds of each other without everything happening all at once and it feeling overwhelming. After rewatching the final product I thought of a stack of balls toppling once you take one from the bottom - hence the short description. I hope you find it as satisfying as I did.
